description: Non-material amendment of planning permission ref. P2023/3616/FUL dated 01/08/2024 in order to amend the wording of condition 3 (materials), condition 15 (green roof) and condition 16 (landscaping). The NMA seeks to amend the triggers for each of these conditions from prior to the commencent of superstructure works to prior to commencent of that relevant part of the works.
decision_conditions:
REWORDED CONDITION 3 MATERIALS (DETAILS): Details and samples of all facing materials shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority prior to commencement of that relevant part of the works. The details and samples shall include: 

a) Metal mesh to the plant enclosure 
b) Timber colonnades 
c) Window treatment (including sections and reveals)
d) Roofing materials 
e) Balustrading treatment (including sections) 
f) Planters, fixed furniture and lighting to the proposed roof terrace 
g) any other materials to be used

The development shall be carried out strictly in accordance with the details so approved and shall be maintained as such thereafter. 

REASON: In the interest of securing sustainable development and to ensure that the resulting appearance and construction of the development is of a high standard.
